title: Which example of strong negative correlation

content.question: Dr. Kerry studies the relationship between age and physical agility. Which of the following graphs shows an example of the likely strong negative correlation between these variables?

choices.label: The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 10 data points. The points begin near the origin and trend upward and to the right, almost in a straight line.
The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 25 data points. The points are spread out relatively evenly across the scatterplot.
The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 13 data points. The points begin near the top of the vertical axis and trend downward and to the right, almost in a straight line.
The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 27 data points. The points begin near the origin and trend upward and to the right in a band like fashion. The points are very closely packed together.

content.answer: The figure presents a scatterplot consisting of 13 data points. The points begin near the top of the vertical axis and trend downward and to the right, almost in a straight line.

skill.text: 3.C: Interpret quantitative or qualitative inferential data from a given table, graph, chart, figure, or diagram.
